description: Unique surrogate key for this permission entry.
Access role or group the permission applies to, used to determine user capabilities.
Code indicating the action or permission effect for the object; values appear binary or enumerated; confirm with SME.
Application object or report to which the permission applies.
Database schema owning the referenced object; likely used to fully qualify it; confirm with SME.
Environment or path indicating where the object resides; likely used for resolving object location; confirm with SME.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this record.
Identifier of the user who created this permission record.
Timestamp when this permission record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp when this record was last modified by a user.
